name: Dandelion Wish
description:
Catch dandelion seeds to make them into twinkling wishes as they drift in the wind! 

• Dandelion Wish's Link = https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/673611358/

- - - Scoring System - - - 

★ 1 Dandelion Seed = 1 wish

- - - How to Play - - -

➤ Tap each dandelion seed using your finger or with the "right-mouse" button.

Expected Play Time: 2 minutes (120 seconds)

Credits: Drawing/Graphics, Music, SFX, and Coding by Ainezumi

This game is mobile friendly and made during the Clicker Jam (Spring 2022).
